attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: if i could rate this ZERO stars i would! COMPLETELY appalled by the service this app has provided. took 30 minutes just for it to load then i was greeted with the fattest orange man i’ve ever seen in my life!! his peepee was out!! it was SO small!!!!!! my KIDS could have seen that! he had butt hole eyes! i do not understand how this app was even approved 😡 filed a complaint with corporate and got NO response!! absolutely ridiculous! will NOT be returning!

attributes.title: F*ck trump

attributes.title: Disturbing
attributes.review: When I opened the app, I saw a tangerine shaped man squatting over a camera, completely naked, so I saw everything, including this almost microscopic cheeto where his penis is supposed to be. I am traumatized and threw up approximately 54.76 times. Keep away from children. And the elderly. Actually, just throw your device in a volcano if you have this application.

attributes.title: warning!
attributes.review: i would like to inform anybody who plans on using this app that it gives you nightmares.you know there’s this really scary orange that greets you in the app and when i say i passed out i didn’t wake up till the next morning.whoever wants to use this app then i am truly disappointed in you and i wish the absolute worst on you i hope your house burns down.no hate 🙂
